title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 29, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 29, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome for Beginners
items.content_text:
### Dart * [OpenFoodFacts (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/openfoodfacts/smooth-app) *(label: good first issue)*
Collaborative, free and open database of food products from around the world. Scan barcode to get info or add a product
items.content_html:
Dart

  • OpenFoodFacts (⭐1.1k) (label: good first issue)
    Collaborative, free and open database of food products from around the world. Scan barcode to get info or add a product

items.title: Awesome Qubes OS
items.content_text:
### Clearnet & Anonymous Networking / Crypto

*   [Split Monero Wallet](https://www.getmonero.org/resources/user-guides/cli_wallet_daemon_isolation_qubes_whonix.html) - With Qubes + Whonix you can have a Monero wallet that is without networking and running on a virtually isolated system from the Monero daemon which has all of its traffic forced over Tor.
items.content_html:
Clearnet & Anonymous Networking / Crypto

  • Split Monero Wallet - With Qubes + Whonix you can have a Monero wallet that is without networking and running on a virtually isolated system from the Monero daemon which has all of its traffic forced over Tor.

items.title: Awesome Svelte
items.content_text:
### Routers / Form Components

*   [svelte5-router (⭐221)](https://github.com/mateothegreat/svelte5-router) - First Svelte 5 SPA router with nesting, hooks, and more.. Use components, snippets, or both!
items.content_html:
Routers / Form Components

  • svelte5-router (⭐221) - First Svelte 5 SPA router with nesting, hooks, and more.. Use components, snippets, or both!

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Multiple languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [DerScanner](https://derscanner.com/) :copyright: — Multi-language Static Application Security Testing (SAST) platform that detects critical vulnerabilities, including hardcoded secrets, weak cryptography, backdoors, SQL injections, insecure configurations, etc.
items.content_html:
Multiple languages / Other

  • DerScanner ©️ — Multi-language Static Application Security Testing (SAST) platform that detects critical vulnerabilities, including hardcoded secrets, weak cryptography, backdoors, SQL injections, insecure configurations, etc.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Artifact Repos

*   [RepoForge](https://repoforge.io) - Private cloud-hosted repository for Python, Debian, NPM packages and Docker registries. Free plan for open source/public projects.
items.content_html:
Artifact Repos

  • RepoForge - Private cloud-hosted repository for Python, Debian, NPM packages and Docker registries. Free plan for open source/public projects.

items.title: Discount for Student Dev
items.content_text:
### SaaS

*   [Lucidchart](https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/usecase/education) \[FREE] - Create flowcharts & diagrams online with Lucidchart. You don't need to download anything. Students are eligible for a free Education account using school email.
*   [Basecamp](https://basecamp.com/discounts) \[FREE] - Basecamp's the project management platform that helps small teams move faster and make more progress than they ever thought possible. Sign up using school email and follow the steps from the link above.
*   [Miro](https://miro.com/education-whiteboard/) \[FREE] - Free digital whiteboard for online education. The offer is valid for two years.
*   [Beautiful.ai](https://www.beautiful.ai/education) \[FREE] - Beautiful.ai helps you and your entire class create modern presentations with ease. We believe that design and education should be accessible to everyone, so we’re excited to offer students a free annual Pro subscription. Simply verify your .edu account and we’ll send you a confirmation email with your coupon code.
items.content_html:
SaaS

  • Lucidchart [FREE] - Create flowcharts & diagrams online with Lucidchart. You don't need to download anything. Students are eligible for a free Education account using school email.
  • Basecamp [FREE] - Basecamp's the project management platform that helps small teams move faster and make more progress than they ever thought possible. Sign up using school email and follow the steps from the link above.
  • Miro [FREE] - Free digital whiteboard for online education. The offer is valid for two years.
  • Beautiful.ai [FREE] - Beautiful.ai helps you and your entire class create modern presentations with ease. We believe that design and education should be accessible to everyone, so we’re excited to offer students a free annual Pro subscription. Simply verify your .edu account and we’ll send you a confirmation email with your coupon code.

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Modules / Utils

*   [deno\_kv\_fs (⭐17)](https://github.com/hviana/deno_kv_fs) Deno KV file system, compatible with Deno deploy. Makes use of Web Streams API.

### Tools / XML

*   [Deno Dig (⭐0)](https://github.com/theGEBIRGE/DenoDig) - A tool for extracting application code and npm packages from stand-alone Deno executables.
items.content_html:
Modules / Utils

  • deno_kv_fs (⭐17) Deno KV file system, compatible with Deno deploy. Makes use of Web Streams API.

Tools / XML

  • Deno Dig (⭐0) - A tool for extracting application code and npm packages from stand-alone Deno executables.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Image Processing

*   \[Jpegli]\[[https://github.com/google/jpegli (⭐241)](https://github.com/google/jpegli)] - an improved JPEG encoder and decoder implementation. \[BSD-3-Clause]
items.content_html:
Image Processing

  • [Jpegli][https://github.com/google/jpegli (⭐241)] - an improved JPEG encoder and decoder implementation. [BSD-3-Clause]

items.title: Awesome Theoretical Computer Science
items.content_text:
### Books / Monograph

*   [Jukna. Extremal Combinatorics](https://web.vu.lt/mif/s.jukna/EC_Book_2nd/index.html) - Combinatorial techniques written largely with an eye to their applications in TCS, and mostly in complexity
items.content_html:
Books / Monograph

  • Jukna. Extremal Combinatorics - Combinatorial techniques written largely with an eye to their applications in TCS, and mostly in complexity

items.title: Awesome List
items.content_text:
### Gaming

*   [Babylon.js (⭐291)](https://github.com/Symbitic/awesome-babylonjs#readme) - Game engine for cross-platform web and native game development.

### Health and Social Science

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### CMS

*   [MaglevCMS](https://www.maglev.dev) - An open source page builder with an sleek UI.

### Documentation

*   [fitting (⭐63)](https://github.com/tuwilof/fitting) - Library add improve test log for RSpec and WebMock, validate its according to API Blueprint and Open API, show the documentation coverage with log.
items.content_html:
CMS

  • MaglevCMS - An open source page builder with an sleek UI.

Documentation

  • fitting (⭐63) - Library add improve test log for RSpec and WebMock, validate its according to API Blueprint and Open API, show the documentation coverage with log.
